docs.snippet: The Buffalo Bills, who have had only one owner in their existence, Ralph Wilson, were taken over Thursday by his wife, Mary, less than two weeks after his death at age 95....

docs.snippet: Mr. Grossman was an Emmy-winning director of football broadcasts who worked with John Madden and Pat Summerall and orchestrated live shows from a production truck....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mr. Grossman was an Emmy-winning director of football broadcasts who worked with John Madden and Pat Summerall and orchestrated live shows from a production truck.
docs.abstract: Sandy Grossman, who aspired to be a broadcaster but instead became an Emmy-winning director of NFL games, dies at age 78.

headline.main: Sandy Grossman, Maestro of N.F.L. on TV, Dies at 78

docs.snippet: The federal Department of Education is investigating whether Florida State properly responded to a student’s sexual assault allegation against Winston, the 2013 Heisman Trophy winner....
docs.lead_paragraph: The federal Department of Education is investigating whether Florida State properly responded to a student’s sexual assault allegation against Winston, the 2013 Heisman Trophy winner.
docs.abstract: Education Dept is investigating whether Florida State properly responded to a student’s allegation that she had been sexually assaulted by star quarterback and Heisman Trophy winner Jameis Winston; inquiry is response to a complaint that Winston’s accuser filed in March with the civil rights office.

headline.main: Inquiry to Revisit Jameis Winston Case on Civil Rights Grounds
headline.print_headline: Winston Case Is Revisited on Civil Rights Grounds
